column2: an A.M. Eatery////I ordered the corned beef hash
column4: and a side pretzel bun. Why? Because pretzel bun. The hash was in a word
column5: bland. I could only taste the onions and the poblanos that way overpowered the meat. The pretzel bun was definitely a pretzel
column6: but unsalted pretzels are slightly less than useless.
